title: Defenseless Hearts
description: In the game of love, winning is harder than it looks. River Baldwin is sexy as puck.Carved abs, strong muscles. His talent with his hockey stick elevates him to godlike status. He’s also in trouble.The center for the Brooklyn Cobras has a PR crisis only I can solve.But he’s arrogant, stubborn, and used to getting his way—all things that make my job harder.His attitude should drive me away, but instead, attraction sizzles between us.Somehow, while I try to salvage his image, I fail to defend my heart.Can I risk letting the cocky player who dominates the game into my heart?Or are the moves River is using on and off the ice going to leave me defenseless and alone?
author: Mika Jolie
